description: All disabled parking spaces as of September 2011. Find attached a data dictionary, a version of the map as a PDF, and a shapefile of the data. Data includes locations and site details; space characteristics, such as space length, side of street the space is located on, curb quality; post ID equivalent, if located in a metered area; date of site visit for available data.
